title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier, give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin export to zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the system fails. An error message box pops up indicating that problems were encountered during export, and the detail lists the file with the same name in project 2 as the problem ('foo.txt' in project 2).
EB: The system should be able to store files with the same name under different directories in the zip file without encountering any problems.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create multiple files with the same name in different directories within two projects.
2. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
3. Select both projects.
4. Provide a name for the zip file.
5. Initiate the export to the zip file.
